mapper.select: select * from board3 where title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from board3 where content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from board3 where title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board3(seq, title, writer, content, files) values((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board3),#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{files})
mapper.update: update board3 set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, files=#{files} where seq=#{seq}
update board3 set cnt=cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
